de.ityx.mediatrix.api.server

Interface ISFilter


  • public interface ISFilter
    Contains the functions for the filter objects (Filters).

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void applyResult(Connection con, Filter filter, List<FilterResult> filterResult, Question question, StringBuffer log)
      Assigns the filter parameters to the question.

      Deprecated. 
      use @link applyResult(Connection, Filter, List, Question, StringBuffer) instead.
      boolean delete(Connection con, Filter filter)
      Deletes the Filter.
      Filter load(Connection con, int id)
      Loads the Filter.
      boolean loadContentFilter(Connection con, Filter filter)
      Loads the list of the regular expressions for the content.
      boolean loadHeaderFilter(Connection con, Filter filter)
      Loads the list of the regular expressions for the headers.
      boolean loadKeywordFilter(Connection con, Filter filter)
      Loads the list of the regular expressions for the keywords.

      Loads the the keywords assigned to the question.

      Deprecated.

      Stores the Filter.
